# isAccessibilityElement

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the item is an accessibility element an assistive application can access.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isAccessibilityElement: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. If the receiver is a UIKit control, the default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: isAccessibilityElement
